properties.name: twitter.access.secret
properties.description: You get this information at apps.twitter.com

properties.name: twitter.access.token
properties.description: You get this information at apps.twitter.com

properties.name: wahl2017.election.short.code
properties.description: This configures two things: (1) an election entity with the short code must be present, if not so a scenario service injects it, (2) the controllers use it do determine the event which is currently active.

properties.name: wahl2017.email.addbcc
properties.description: If set every e-mail sent out has this address in BCC

properties.name: wahl2017.email.cron
properties.description: The result of cron job runs is e-mailed to there

properties.name: wahl2017.email.sender
properties.description: Outgoing e-mail is sent from this address
